item.title: GM
item.description: score:-89 Chances: General Motors’ shares rose 7.8% after the company gave a bullish profit outlook for 2024 and said it plans to introduce some plug-in hybrid models. GM reported top and bottom line beats for the fourth quarter and issued 2024 full-year profit guidance that matched its initial forecast for 2023, indicating a positive financial outlook.
